languages.text: "Признаюсь, шерин, я восхищена. Вы перв{mf|ый|ая}, кто обыграл меня, опираясь исключительно на прочность печени! Я бы предложила реванш, но... боюсь, меня обвинят в попытке споить Вольного Торговца до смерти. Так что, с вашего позволения, лучше я пойду проветрюсь".

"I must admit my astonishment, shereen. This is the first time an opponent has ever bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of trying to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."
languages.original_text: "Признаюсь, шерин, я восхищена. Вы перв{mf|ый|ая}, кто обыграл меня, опираясь исключительно на прочность печени! Я бы предложила реванш, но... боюсь, меня обвинят в попытке споить Вольного Торговца до смерти. Так что, с вашего позволения, лучше я пойду проветрюсь".

traits.locale_text: "I admit my astonishment, shereen. You are the first opponent to have bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of attempting to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So, with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must admit my astonishment, shereen. This is the first time an opponent has ever bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of trying to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je dois avouer que vous m'impressionnez, shereen. C'est la première fois que quelqu'un me bat en comptant uniquement sur la résistance de son foie ! Je demanderais bien ma revanche, mais... j'aurais peur qu'on m'accuse de vouloir tuer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} par intoxication. Alors, si vous le permettez, je vais aller prendre l'air. »
languages.original_text: "I must admit my astonishment, shereen. This is the first time an opponent has ever bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of trying to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois avouer que vous m'impressionnez, shereen. C'est la première fois que quelqu'un me bat en comptant uniquement sur la résistance de son foie ! Je demanderais bien ma revanche, mais... j'aurais peur qu'on m'accuse de vouloir tuer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} par intoxication. Alors, si vous le permettez, je vais aller prendre l'air. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Debo admitir que estoy impresionada, shereen. ¡Es la primera vez que alguien me derrota confiando en la fuerza de su hígado! Propondría la revancha, pero... me temo que podrían acusarme de intentar matar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a base de alcohol. Con su permiso, me gustaría tomar un poco el aire».
languages.original_text: "I must admit my astonishment, shereen. This is the first time an opponent has ever bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of trying to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."

traits.locale_text: «Debo admitir que estoy impresionada, shereen. ¡Es la primera vez que alguien me derrota confiando en la fuerza de su hígado! Propondría la revancha, pero... me temo que podrían acusarme de intentar matar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a base de alcohol. Con su permiso, me gustaría tomar un poco el aire».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我得承认我很吃惊，亲爱的。这还是第一次，我的对手仅仅靠强悍的肝功能就打败了我！虽然我很想和你重赛一场，不过……他们恐怕会觉得我打算把行商浪人灌死。所以，如果你允许的话，我最好还是出去透透气吧。”
languages.original_text: "I must admit my astonishment, shereen. This is the first time an opponent has ever bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of trying to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."

traits.locale_text: “我得承认我很吃惊，亲爱的。这还是第一次，我的对手仅仅靠强悍的肝功能就打败了我！虽然我很想和你重赛一场，不过……他们恐怕会觉得我打算把行商浪人灌死。所以，如果你允许的话，我最好还是出去透透气吧。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「驚いたよ、シェリーン。肝の強さだけで私を打ち負かした相手は初めてだ！再戦を提案したいところだが…ローグトレーダーを死ぬまで飲ませたんだと、疑われそうだ。よければ、ちょっと外の空気を吸わせてくれ」
languages.original_text: "I must admit my astonishment, shereen. This is the first time an opponent has ever bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of trying to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."

traits.locale_text: 「驚いたよ、シャリーン。肝の強さだけで私を打ち負かした相手は初めてだ！再戦を提案したいところだが…ローグトレーダーを死ぬまで飲ませたんだと、疑われそうだ。よければ、ちょっと外の空気を吸わせてくれ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss gestehen, ich bin erstaunt, Shereen. Das ist das erste Mal überhaupt, dass mich ein Gegner allein durch die Stärke seiner Leber besiegt hat! Ich würde ja eine Revanche vorschlagen, aber ... Ich fürchte, man könnte mir vorwerfen, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} totsaufen zu wollen. Mit Eurer Erlaubnis gehe ich also lieber ein wenig Luft schnappen."
languages.original_text: "I must admit my astonishment, shereen. This is the first time an opponent has ever bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of trying to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss gestehen, ich bin erstaunt, Shereen. Das ist das erste Mal überhaupt, dass mich ein Gegner allein durch die Stärke seiner Leber besiegt hat! Ich würde ja eine Revanche vorschlagen, aber ... Ich fürchte, man könnte mir vorwerfen, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} totsaufen zu wollen. Mit Eurer Erlaubnis gehe ich also lieber ein wenig Luft schnappen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Büyülendiğimi itiraf etmeliyim şirinim. Hiçbir rakibim beni daha önce sırf karaciğerinden güç alarak mağlup etmemişti! Rövanş teklif ederdim aslında ama... Beni Hür Tacir'i içire içire öldürmeye çalışmakla suçlayacaklarından korkuyorum. O yüzden iznin olursa gidip biraz hava alacağım sanırım."
languages.original_text: "I must admit my astonishment, shereen. This is the first time an opponent has ever bested me by relying solely on the strength of their liver! I would propose a rematch, however... I'm afraid they might accuse me of trying to drink the Rogue Trader to death. So with your permission, I think I'd better go get some air."
